name: Rowdy Round-Up (GMTK Game Jam 2020)
description:
Game by Ryan Wade for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Theme: Out of Control - How can you corral your hogs when you can't even control your men?

All art and code by myself. All sound effects and music found online Royalty-Free.

Hillbilly Swing by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5705-hillbilly-swing
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
